info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:37PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Perry, northwestern Jackson, northeastern Bollinger, Perry and northwestern Cape Girardeau Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 637 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Coulterville to Bremen to near Womac to Fredericktown. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Willisville around 655 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Perryville, Ava, Pinckneyville, Alliance, Tamaroa and Du Quoin. This includes Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 117 and 139. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
